description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

description: Original URL where tweet was retrieved from.

description: A series of longitude and latitude points, defining a box which will contain the Place entity this bounding box is related to

name: place.bounding_box.type
description: A box of coordinates

description: Shortened country code representing the country containing this place.

description: Full human-readable representation of the place’s name.

description: ID representing this place

name: place.name
description: Short human-readable representation of the place’s name.

name: place.place_type
description: The type of location represented by this place

name: place.url
description: URL representing the location of additional place metadata for this place.

name: project
description: Project name.

description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy).
